channel.title: Delicious Recipes Feed - Pinterest
channel.description: Fresh recipes and cooking inspiration for Pinterest discovery

item.title: Honey Glazed Ham
item.description: This Honey Glazed Ham is the centerpiece of any festive gathering, boasting a sweet and savory glaze that caramelizes beautifully in the oven. With its tender meat and delightful aroma, it’s sure to impress your family and friends. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 150min | Serves: 10 | #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 150 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 165 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 10

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 8-10 lb bone-in ham
  • 1 cup honey
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/4 cup Dijon mustard
  • Cloves
  • Pineapple rings

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (165°C).
  2. Score the ham in a diamond pattern, making shallow cuts across the surface.
  3. Stud the ham with cloves, placing them in the intersections of the diamond pattern.
  4. In a bowl, mix together the honey, brown sugar, and Dijon mustard until well combined.
  5. Brush the glaze generously over the ham, ensuring it gets into the scored cuts.
  6. Place the ham in a roasting pan and bake for 2 hours, basting frequently with the remaining glaze.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #bonein #honey #brown

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

media:content.media:description: This Honey Glazed Ham is the centerpiece of any festive gathering, boasting a sweet and savory glaze that caramelizes beautifully in the oven. With its tender meat and delightful aroma, it’s sure to impress your family and friends.

item.title: Matzo Ball Soup
item.description: Warm, comforting, and filled with rich flavors, Matzo Ball Soup is the perfect dish to nourish both body and soul. This classic recipe combines fluffy matzo balls with a savory chicken broth and fresh vegetables, making it a beloved favorite for any occasion. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 90min | Serves: 4 | #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 90 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 105 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 eggs
  • 1 cup matzo meal
  • 1/4 cup oil or schmaltz
  • 1/4 cup seltzer water
  • salt
  • 8 cups chicken broth
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • fresh dill, for garnish
  • fresh parsley, for garnish
  • cooked chicken (optional)

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix together the eggs, oil, seltzer water, and salt until well combined.
  2. Stir in the matzo meal and refrigerate the mixture for 30 minutes.
  3. With wet hands, form the mixture into balls.
  4. In a large pot, bring salted water to a boil and gently add the matzo balls, cooking for 30-40 minutes.
  5. Meanwhile, in another pot, simmer the chicken broth with the diced carrots, celery, and onion until the vegetables are tender.
  6. Once the matzo balls are cooked, add them to the soup and garnish with fresh dill and parsley before serving.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #matzo #schmaltz

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

media:content.media:description: Warm, comforting, and filled with rich flavors, Matzo Ball Soup is the perfect dish to nourish both body and soul. This classic recipe combines fluffy matzo balls with a savory chicken broth and fresh vegetables, making it a beloved favorite for any occasion.

item.title: Sufganiyot (Jelly Doughnuts)
item.description: Indulge in the sweet, fluffy delight of Sufganiyot, the perfect treat for any occasion. These jelly-filled doughnuts are a festive favorite that will bring joy to your table and smiles to your loved ones. | ⏱️ Prep: 120min | Cook: 10min | Serves: 12 | #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 120 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 130 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 12

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 3 1/2 cups flour
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 2 1/4 tsp active dry yeast
  • 3/4 cup warm milk
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/4 cup butter, melted
  • Jelly or jam for filling
  • Powdered sugar for dusting
  • Oil for frying

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Mix yeast with warm milk and sugar, let foam for 10 minutes.
  2. Add flour, eggs, and melted butter; knead until smooth.
  3. Let dough rise for 1 hour until doubled in size.
  4. Roll out dough and cut into circles; let rise for another 30 minutes.
  5. Deep fry at 350°F (175°C) until golden, about 2-3 minutes per side.
  6. Cool, then inject with jelly using a piping bag.
  7. Dust generously with powdered sugar before serving.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #flour #sugar #active

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Dumplings (Jiaozi)
item.description: These homemade dumplings are a delightful blend of savory pork and fresh vegetables, wrapped in tender dough. Perfect for sharing, they bring warmth and comfort to any meal. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230072178 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground pork
  • 2 cups napa cabbage, finely chopped
  • 2 green onions, minced
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sesame oil
  • Ginger, minced
  • Garlic, minced
  • Dumpling wrappers (store-bought or homemade)
  • Dipping sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, chili oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Salt the cabbage and let it sit for 10 minutes, then squeeze out the moisture.
  2. In a bowl, mix the ground pork, cabbage, green onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic until well combined.
  3. Place a spoonful of filling in the center of each dumpling wrapper.
  4. Fold and pleat the edges of the wrapper to seal the dumpling.
  5. Boil, steam, or pan-fry the dumplings for 6-8 minutes until cooked through.
  6. Serve with a dipping sauce made of soy sauce, vinegar, and chili oil.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230072178 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pound #cabbage #green

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Pad Thai
item.description: Experience the vibrant flavors of Thailand with this classic Pad Thai recipe. It's a delightful stir-fry that combines tender rice noodles, succulent shrimp, and a medley of fresh ingredients, all tossed in a savory tamarind sauce that will transport your taste buds straight to the streets of Bangkok. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 15min | Serves: 4 | #1 #mediumrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 15 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 30 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 8 oz rice noodles
  • 8 oz shrimp or chicken
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 cup bean sprouts
  • 1/4 cup peanuts, crushed
  • 1 lime, cut into wedges
  • 2 tablespoons tamarind paste
  • 2 tablespoons fish sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 shallots, sliced

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20 minutes until soft.
  2. In a large skillet or wok, stir-fry shrimp or chicken with minced garlic over medium-high heat until cooked through.
  3. Push the protein to one side of the pan, crack in the eggs, and scramble until just set.
  4. Add the soaked noodles to the skillet along with tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar; toss everything together until well combined.
  5. Stir in bean sprouts and cook for an additional minute.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #1 #mediumrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #noodles #shrimp

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Loaded Baked Potato Soup
item.description: Indulge in the creamy, savory goodness of Loaded Baked Potato Soup, a comforting bowl that brings the flavors of a classic baked potato to life. Topped with crispy bacon, melty cheese, and fresh green onions, this soup is perfect for chilly evenings or as a hearty starter for any meal. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230594885 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large russet potatoes, diced
  • 6 strips bacon
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 2 cups chicken broth
  • Cheddar cheese, for topping
  • Sour cream, for topping
  • Green onions, for topping

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook bacon in a large pot until crispy, then set aside on paper towels to drain.
  2. In the same pot, sauté the diced potatoes in the bacon fat until slightly softened.
  3. Add chicken broth to the pot and bring to a simmer; cook for about 20 minutes until potatoes are tender.
  4. Mash some of the potatoes in the pot for a thicker texture, then stir in the heavy cream.
  5. Serve hot, topped with crumbled bacon, shredded cheddar cheese, a dollop of sour cream, and sliced green onions.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230594885 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #large #strips #heavy

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Classic Fried Chicken
item.description: This Classic Fried Chicken is a crispy, golden delight that brings comfort and joy to any meal. Perfectly seasoned and fried to perfection, it's a dish that will have everyone coming back for seconds. | ⏱️ Prep: 120min | Cook: 15min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761229889885 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 120 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 15 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 135 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 8 chicken pieces (drumsticks, thighs, breasts)
  • 2 cups buttermilk
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 2 tsp paprika
  • 2 tsp garlic powder
  • 2 tsp salt
  • 2 tsp black pepper
  • Vegetable oil for frying

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk for at least 2 hours.
  2. In a bowl, mix flour with paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
  3. Remove chicken from buttermilk and dredge in the seasoned flour until well coated.
  4. Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large skillet to 350°F (175°C).
  5. Deep fry chicken pieces for 12-15 minutes until golden brown and cooked through.
  6. Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761229889885 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #chicken #buttermilk #allpurpose

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
item.description: Indulge in the simplicity and bold flavors of Pasta Aglio e Olio, a classic Italian dish that comes together in just minutes. With garlic, olive oil, and a hint of spice, this dish is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a cozy gathering with friends. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 15min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230383494 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 15 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 30 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 400g spaghetti
  • 6 cloves garlic, minced
  • 100ml olive oil
  • dried red chili flakes
  • fresh parsley, chopped
  • salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente.
  2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant but not browned.
  3. Add the dried chili flakes and chopped parsley to the skillet, stirring to combine.
  4. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet, tossing well to coat the pasta in the garlic oil mixture.
  5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve immediately.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230383494 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #spaghetti #cloves #olive

item.title: Gratin Dauphinois
item.description: Indulge in the creamy, cheesy goodness of Gratin Dauphinois, a classic French dish that transforms simple potatoes into a luxurious side. With layers of tender potatoes enveloped in a rich cream sauce, this dish is perfect for any occasion. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 60min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230594885 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 kg potatoes, finely sliced
  • 500 ml heavy cream
  • 200 ml milk
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • Nutmeg, to taste
  • Grated Gruyère cheese, for topping

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
  2. Finely slice the potatoes and set aside.
  3. Rub a baking dish with minced garlic to infuse flavor.
  4. Layer the sliced potatoes in the dish, alternating with the cream and milk mixture.
  5. Sprinkle nutmeg and top with grated Gruyère cheese.
  6. Bake for 1 hour until golden and bubbly.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230594885 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #potatoes #heavy

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Fondant au Chocolat
item.description: Indulge in the rich, velvety goodness of this classic Fondant au Chocolat, where each bite reveals a luscious molten center. Perfect for chocolate lovers, this dessert is sure to impress at any gathering. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 12min | Serves: 6 | #cat1761230294638 #mediumrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 12 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 27 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 200g dark chocolate
  • 150g butter
  • 150g sugar
  • 4 eggs
  • 50g flour

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Melt the dark chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
  2. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and sugar until pale and fluffy.
  3. Incorporate the melted chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, then gently fold in the flour.
  4. Pour the batter into greased ramekins and bake at 180°C for 12 minutes for a gooey center.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230294638 #mediumrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #chocolate #butter #sugar

item.description: This vibrant bruschetta with fresh tomatoes and basil is a delightful appetizer that bursts with flavor. Perfectly toasted bread topped with a refreshing mix makes it an irresistible starter for any gathering. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 10min | Serves: 12 | #cat1761230221583 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 25 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 12

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 baguette
  • 4 ripe tomatoes, diced
  • Fresh basil leaves, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the grill or oven to medium-high heat.
  2. Slice the baguette into 1/2 inch thick slices and grill until golden brown.
  3. Rub each slice with minced garlic while still warm.
  4. In a bowl, combine diced tomatoes, chopped basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
  5. Spoon the tomato mixture generously onto each slice of grilled bread.

item.title: Vegan Chickpea Curry
item.description: This Vegan Chickpea Curry is a delightful blend of spices and creamy coconut milk that will transport your taste buds to a world of flavor. Quick to prepare and packed with nutrients, it's perfect for a comforting weeknight dinner. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 15min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230072178 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 15 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 30 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
  • 400ml coconut milk
  • 1 can diced tomatoes
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 inch ginger, grated
  • 1 tablespoon curry powder
  • 1 teaspoon turmeric
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 2 cups fresh spinach

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, sauté the chopped onion, minced garlic, and grated ginger until fragrant.
  2. Add the curry powder, turmeric, and cumin, stirring for about 1 minute.
  3. Pour in the diced tomatoes and coconut milk, bringing the mixture to a simmer.
  4. Stir in the chickpeas and let it simmer for 15 minutes to meld the flavors.
  5. Add the fresh spinach just before serving, allowing it to wilt.

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Herb Roasted Chicken with Vegetables
item.description: This Herb Roasted Chicken with Vegetables is a comforting dish that fills your home with delightful aromas. Perfectly seasoned and beautifully roasted, it's a meal that brings family together around the table. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 75min | Serves: 4 | #1 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 75 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 90 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 whole chicken (3.3 lbs)
  • 2 carrots, chopped
  • 2 potatoes, chopped
  • 1 onion, quartered
  • 2 sprigs thyme
  • 2 sprigs rosemary
  • 1 lemon, halved
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
  2. Season the chicken inside and out with thyme, rosemary, and lemon juice.
  3. Place the chopped vegetables around the chicken in a roasting pan.
  4. Drizzle olive oil over the chicken and vegetables.
  5. Roast in the preheated oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the chicken is golden brown and juices run clear.

item.title: Fluffy Pancakes
item.description: Indulge in these fluffy pancakes that are perfect for breakfast or brunch. With a golden exterior and soft, airy interior, they are sure to delight everyone at the table. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 20min | Serves: 8 | #cat1761230422512 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 35 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 250 grams all-purpose flour
  • 2 eggs
  • 300 milliliters milk
  • 50 grams melted butter
  • 2 tablespoons sugar
  • 1 packet baking powder

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large bowl, mix the dry ingredients: flour, sugar, and baking powder.
  2. In another bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and melted butter.
  3. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
  4. Let the batter rest for 10 minutes.
  5. Heat a skillet over medium heat and pour in a ladle of batter.
  6. Cook for 2 minutes on each side until golden brown.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230422512 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #allpurpose #milliliters

item.title: Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad
item.description: This Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad is a vibrant and nutritious dish that combines the earthy flavors of grilled vegetables with the nutty taste of quinoa. Perfect for a light lunch or as a side dish, it's both satisfying and refreshing. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 20min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230636499 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 35 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 200g quinoa
  • 1 zucchini, diced
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 1 eggplant, diced
  • 100g chickpeas, cooked
  • Juice of 1 lemon
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Fresh mint leaves, chopped

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions until fluffy.
  2. Grill the diced zucchini, bell pepper, and eggplant until tender and slightly charred.
  3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, grilled vegetables, and chickpeas.
  4. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil, then toss gently to combine.
  5. Garnish with fresh mint before serving.
